name: SAA-AI
description: DrPal is a platform revolutionizing healthcare by integrating blockchain, AI, and NFTs. Built on the Solana blockchain, it empowers patients with NFT-based health records, ensuring data ownership, security, and transparency. The platform simplifies processes for healthcare providers, supports researchers with anonymized patient-approved data, and improves claims processing for insurers. Powered by the DrPal Token (DRPAL), users can access premium features, earn rewards for wellness milestones, and participate in a decentralized healthcare ecosystem. DrPal fosters collaboration, enhances efficiency, and promotes proactive health management, positioning itself as a transformative force in modern healthcare.
